text: Israel Erwin Vargas Montoya (born March 6, 1984) is a Mexican football manager and former player. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Club León footballers Category:Toros Neza footballers Category:Liga MX players Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Footballers from Mexico City
